title: 'Unbroken' Skips Over Louis Zamperini's Post-War Struggles
teaser: The movie is based on the 2010 nonfiction book by Laura Hillenbrand about a U.S. Olympic track star who survives a plane crash during World War II only to be taken prisoner by the Japanese.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
